LanguageData.WaterSpring.label: water spring
LanguageData.WaterSpring.description: A natural source of water that generates flowing water over time. The water will spread to nearby areas according to basic diffusion rules.
LanguageData.FlowingWater.label: flowing water
LanguageData.FlowingWater.description: Water flowing from a water spring. It will spread to nearby areas over time, following the path of least resistance.
